document.full_text: south african thomas aiken extended his lead at a windswept spanish open on saturday but the day's action was overshadowed by the death of seve ballesteros.
document.title: aiken reflects on ballesteros impact as he extends lead
lines_and_colors: south african thomas aiken extended his lead at a windswept spanish open on saturday but the day's action was overshadowed by the death of seve ballesteros.
